data.message: Eminem is elegantly ever ready, to be ending every emcee that's never ready, it's him he is crazy rapping, diss him and Slim Shadys slashing, you apart, he's gruesome dark, a super shark, biting bitches up like butter, now nobody never diss him look thy Nutter, will leave you with no body, chopping you up like a demon possessed his own body, shouting savagely you suckers won't stop me, proud skilled an Em he's a great rapper Eminem is the best, out killing emcees' an fake rappers ending them is his quest!
